rules: Labels: Uppercase, Tracking wide (0.05em), Text-xs, Font-bold

usage_rules: Primary Color (Yellow) is for ACTIONS (Buttons, Links, Active States).
Secondary Color (Black) is for STRUCTURE (Sidebar, Header, Typography).
NEVER use gradients for the yellow. Keep it flat and bold.
Contrast: Ensure black text on yellow buttons.

rules: Use generous padding (p-6 or p-8) inside cards.
Gap-6 or Gap-8 for grid layouts.

buttons.primary: bg-yellow-400 text-black hover:bg-yellow-500 font-bold rounded-md shadow-sm transition-colors
buttons.secondary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-gray-900 font-medium rounded-md shadow-sm
buttons.outline: border-2 border-black text-black hover:bg-gray-50 font-medium rounded-md

cards.style: bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow

inputs.style: bg-white border-gray-300 focus:border-black focus:ring-1 focus:ring-black rounded-md h-10

tables.header: bg-gray-50 text-gray-500 uppercase text-xs font-bold tracking-wider

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style

Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Sidebar with a fixed width (w-64) and full height. Use the 'secondary' color (Black) for its background.
The Main Content area should be to the right of the sidebar with a white background.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings (h1, h2, h3).
Use the 'Inter' font for all body text.
Ensure all buttons use the 'primary' (Yellow) or 'secondary' (Black) styles defined in components.
For the Dashboard, use the Bento Grid layout with 'cards' style for widgets.
Login page should use a split layout: Left side form, Right side 'login_hero' image.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
